Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We can't relax yet. Based on what we've detected, several Corrupted have been patrolling around hereâ€”I'm afraid there are going to be more than just one wave of enemies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It wouldn't have picked this time to attack otherwise.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm not going to lose when it comes to tactics.", 3: '15', 4: "We'll take them down if they come! We've got you all here!", 5: '13'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Nothing more than some naive talk from an idealist.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you... smiling?', 3: '22', 4: "But that's why you accept us, isn't it?", 5: '22'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Standby, everyone! We're expecting a possible second wave!", 4: '1'}
